channel.title: Comments on: So, What’s Wrong With the Glo NIN Advert flagged by APCON?
channel.description: Web × Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/so-whats-wrong-with-the-glo-nin-advert-flagged-by-apcon/#comment-578">Chioma</a>.
Tbvh, I have watched TV programs (Especially music TV shows) where presenters/hosts dress like this. Although I understand that that is beyond the scope of APCON's purpose. Well, my opinion may be influenced by the fact that I have seen women also dress like this in the office and no one said anything about it. So why not an ad?

item.title: By: Chioma
item.dc:creator: Chioma
item.description: I think APCON was right to order that the advert be taken down. It made me cringe when I saw the advert. It’s just too much exposure. Not the right platform for an appearance as such in my opinion.
